body: I was playing for a good amount of time last night and once i went to go look at my rank it didn't change, however my Kills, Deaths, PvP K/D, and K/D changed. I know i'm not ranked 2428th. Although when i look on the LeaderBoard my rank is 1215th, compaired to when i look at my Rank on my homepage. Someone please help! My Ocd is killing me! Thanks again. -SergeantBoom
body_tagged: I was playing for a good amount of time last night and once i went to go look at my rank it didn't change, however my Kills, Deaths, PvP K/D, and K/D changed. title: My Ranks on the LeaderBoard wont change!

replies.body: Yeah its a glitch the rank on the leaderboard is your real rank.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah its a glitch the rank on the leaderboard is your real rank.

replies.body:
It's probably just a website glitch.
Report any glitches or problems that you see to a Sr. staff member.
replies.body_tagged:
It's probably just a website glitch.
Report any glitches or problems that you see to a Sr. staff member.

replies.body: How does it get fixed, and who would i talk to about it Porky?

replies.body: I would try contacting NolanDalton or jozzmcozz, that is what I usually do. Their skype names can be found on their profiles.

replies.body: I have not got a response... I really want the glitch fixed! Anyone who has had the same problem, has it been fixed, is its still glitched, is there even a way to fix it yet? I really need this fixed!
